title: What is EnglishBoard?
answer: EnglishBoard is a platform that allows Professor Gustavo Pistolesi’s students to access interactive lessons. It also provides study materials for each grade and phonetics course they are taking.

title: Do I need to create an account?
answer: No. The grade or course you select is saved in your browser, so you can automatically access it again when you reload or reopen the page.

title: Can I choose a different grade or course?
answer: Yes. You can log out and select any grade or course as many times as you like.

title: How do the lessons work?
answer: Lessons are divided into modules. Each module covers a specific topic and includes practice exercises related to it.

title: What happens with the lesson exercises?
answer: Exercises are corrected once you press Finish, but your results are not saved when you exit the lesson. You will not receive a grade based on your performance. The exercises are only meant as a personal tool to check your understanding of the topic.

title: Why don’t I see any lessons and/or videos available?
answer: This may be due to several reasons, which will be specified on the page when the error occurs. In any case, please wait a few minutes. If the problem persists, contact us using the following form:

title: How often are lessons and/or videos uploaded?
answer: Lessons and videos are uploaded by the professor, so it may take some time before new material is added to the virtual classroom.
